snippet: Tottenham Hotspur expect to be without injured captain Hugo Lloris for four weeks, the Premier League side confirmed in a statement on Tuesday....

headline.main: Injured Tottenham Captain Lloris Out for Four Weeks
headline.print_headline: Injured Tottenham Captain Lloris Out for Four Weeks

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur expect to be without injured captain Hugo Lloris for four weeks, the Premier League side confirmed in a statement on Tuesday.

snippet: English second-tier club Wolverhampton Wanderers has become China's latest soccer investment....

headline.main: English Soccer Club Wolves Bought by China's Fosun Group
headline.print_headline: English Soccer Club Wolves Bought by China's Fosun Group

lead_paragraph: English second-tier club Wolverhampton Wanderers has become China's latest soccer investment.

snippet: Premier League Swansea City fell victims to the first major giant-killing of the FA Cup third round on Sunday when they lost 3-2 away to League Two (fourth tier) side Oxford United....

headline.main: Swansea Shocked, Chelsea Win, Kane Saves Spurs
headline.print_headline: Swansea Shocked, Chelsea Win, Kane Saves Spurs

lead_paragraph: Premier League Swansea City fell victims to the first major giant-killing of the FA Cup third round on Sunday when they lost 3-2 away to League Two (fourth tier) side Oxford United.

snippet: Liverpool's Sadio Mane says he is fit for Saturday's Premier League clash against champions Leicester City, dismissing reports that he had sustained an injury in Senegal's African Nations Cup qualifier last week....

headline.main: Liverpool's Mane Fit for Leicester Clash
headline.print_headline: Liverpool's Mane Fit for Leicester Clash

lead_paragraph: Liverpool's Sadio Mane says he is fit for Saturday's Premier League clash against champions Leicester City, dismissing reports that he had sustained an injury in Senegal's African Nations Cup qualifier last week.

snippet: Leeds United have signed Scotland midfielder Liam Bridcutt from Sunderland on a two-year contract, the two clubs confirmed on Tuesday....

headline.main: Sunderland Sell Scotland's Bridcutt to Leeds
headline.print_headline: Sunderland Sell Scotland's Bridcutt to Leeds

lead_paragraph: Leeds United have signed Scotland midfielder Liam Bridcutt from Sunderland on a two-year contract, the two clubs confirmed on Tuesday.

snippet: Former Arsenal and Barcelona midfielder Alexander Hleb has rejoined BATE Borisov, the Belarusian club said on Friday....

headline.main: Former Arsenal Midfielder Hleb Rejoins BATE Borisov
headline.print_headline: Former Arsenal Midfielder Hleb Rejoins BATE Borisov

lead_paragraph: Former Arsenal and Barcelona midfielder Alexander Hleb has rejoined BATE Borisov, the Belarusian club said on Friday.

snippet: Norwich City earned their first win in 11 Premier League matches on Saturday with a Robbie Brady goal that could prove critical in the battle against relegation....

headline.main: Brady Strike Earns a Win, at Last, for Struggling Norwich
headline.print_headline: Brady Strike Earns a Win, at Last, for Struggling Norwich

lead_paragraph: Norwich City earned their first win in 11 Premier League matches on Saturday with a Robbie Brady goal that could prove critical in the battle against relegation.

snippet: Norwich City have signed Spanish midfielder Sergi Canos from Liverpool on a four-year-deal, with the option of a further year, the Engish Championship side said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Norwich Sign Spanish Midfielder Canos From Liverpool
headline.print_headline: Norwich Sign Spanish Midfielder Canos From Liverpool

lead_paragraph: Norwich City have signed Spanish midfielder Sergi Canos from Liverpool on a four-year-deal, with the option of a further year, the Engish Championship side said on Wednesday.

snippet: Jose Mourinho resumes his rivalry with Arsene Wenger on Saturday on the back of a simple message: Give me some respect....

headline.main: Mourinho Demands Respect as He Resumes Rivalry With Wenger
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Demands Respect as He Resumes Rivalry With Wenger

lead_paragraph: Jose Mourinho resumes his rivalry with Arsene Wenger on Saturday on the back of a simple message: Give me some respect.

snippet: Manchester United centre back Eric Bailly hopes to play again within two months after injuring his knee in their 4-0 Premier League defeat at Chelsea on Sunday....

headline.main: Manchester United's Bailly Hopes to Return Within Two Months
headline.print_headline: Manchester United's Bailly Hopes to Return Within Two Months

lead_paragraph: Manchester United centre back Eric Bailly hopes to play again within two months after injuring his knee in their 4-0 Premier League defeat at Chelsea on Sunday.
